title: The 3T Exploro Racemax Boost Italia Is an Italian-Made E-Gravel Bike
content:
The brand's latest Made in Italy bike features electric assist paired to their aero gravel frameset.

Read the full article at The 3T Exploro Racemax Boost Italia Is an Italian-Made E-Gravel Bike on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
